attributes.action: All Downing Street press conferences must have a person signing what is said.
attributes.additional_details: Most other countries already do this.
attributes.background: Make all press conferences from the executive accessible to all citizens as much as possible.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ensure a Sign Language Interpreter is present at televised Government briefings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552091
